comments.comment: In the sequential order of events. He is being a decorated soldier was allowed to be used by a 3rd grade set  of politicians ( who ran torture chambers in 1980 s, and who did not have the political will to end the money spinning war), to achieve the political goals in 2010 elections. Then the government sent him quite unnecessarily to jail. Then again from 2015, after the jail event , the same 3rd grade politics started using his personal anger over the Rajapaksha family to meet their political ends. My belief is , he too was an utter fool  not knowing his true values as the most decorated soldier in Sri Lanka. I myself and and most who voted for Gota value his role. The way to go forward is for him to openly value the political will of the Rajapakshas to end the war while Rajapakshas should openly value his and other forces commanders heroics. These were no small deeds realizing the brutality of the war. Tks.
comments.author: Upul Perera

comments.comment: Dear  Mr Fonseka MP, I seriously think that Parliament MPs, Ministers, Cabinet ministers all together should be limited to 50. Why do Sri Lankan Taxpayers take the burden to feed 225 MPs. You all are given Benz Cars, Jeeps, Free petrol, Houses and after that 5-years pension. Above all, any idiot can go to Parliament even without GCE OL. The current electoral areas should be widened to minimize the number of MPs to 50. We have Town council elections, Palath Saba elections, Pradesiya Saba Elections and many more. What a nonsense. I think Late Pres. R. Premadasa brought all those nonsense.  Abolish all and appoint good educated administrators to replace wherever possible. If we have honest dedicated police force, Army, Navy, Airforce where Politicians cannot interfere like in developed countries (Australia, UK, USA Europe) then we can develop. We should have a good honest, impartial one legal system for the whole country. Not, different legal system for Muslims and Sharia law in Sri Lanka and Thesavalmei to Jaffna and UP-country Tamils another law. The time has come to launch projects to increase the Sinhalese population also inline with Muslims. No specific regions should be allowed to Muslims, Tamils. I hope you will support this idea as a Sinhalese.
comments.author: Singappuli Wijewardana

comments.comment:
I have a high regard for those engaged in the security forces more so who command those forces putting not only their lives at risk but their troops. FM Fonseka ought not be critical of those who voted for Gota as being fools they did so out of conviction and refused to be duped by the con men of the UNP something that cannot be disputed. The likes of Samaraweera, senaratne, karunanayake, few davidians and Muslim are a curse on the party!
Sajith expected to win by default unfortunately it did not work out the way the party nor Sajith expected.
Come general election UNP will face an ignoble defeat for the sinhala as a race that should be reckoned with
comments.author: zama abesiri

replies.replyComment: Be a good soldier like Hector kobewaduwa May blessings of the triple jem protect you and the lsland

Mohu nathnam ape minissu laksha gaanak marila. Mahinda mathi thmata wada isththi karanna ohne deviyanta apiwa betaganna kiyal  kannalavkara ayata saha me veera thumatai. Sththiy devi pihitai oba thumata. Hamadhama apith ekka inna.
Ow bn ape un modayo praba kiwwa ne dalada maligawa ta gahala thawa sathiyakin unath Sri maha bodiyata gahanna puluwan kiyala e kathawa aththa rajapaksha 2015 de EPA Una unma aye unwa balayata genawa
